Bioacoustics and ecoacoustics quotes

This package leans heavily on the code of statquotes with some functions renamed and a different database of quotes.

Authors of statquotes

Michael Friendly, Kevin Wright, Phil Chalmers, Matthew Sigal

Modifications to the statquotes code and database were made by:

Ed Baker
